# Charset classification tests
# Each charset type with high entropy (should redact)

# Hex (threshold 3.0) - random 32-char hex
hex_key=a1b2c3d4e5f6a7b8c9d0e1f2a3b4c5d6

# Alphanumeric (threshold 4.5) - random mixed case with numbers
alnum_key=xK9mNpL2qR5tW8vY1zA4bC7dE0fG3hJ6

# Base64 with + char (threshold 4.5) - note: = is a delimiter
b64_key=ZkKDkpv7igaXJaRjojfdNpd+27+2esVXAMU4QIRc

# Mixed charset with punctuation (uses alphanumeric threshold 4.5)
mixed_key=xK9m.NpL2+qR5t/W8vY1zA4bC7dE0fG3
